articles.title: Signal issues cause multiple delays and cancellations on at least 6 commuter rail lines

articles.title: Bud Cort, who starred in 1971’s ‘Harold and Maude,’ dies at 77
articles.description:

summary: Bud Cort, iconic actor from 'Harold and Maude,' passed away at 77 on February 11, 2026.
Cort's role in the 1971 film made him a symbol of the 1970s anti-establishment movement.
His death may resonate with Boston's film community and fans of classic cinema.

articles.title: Former Worcester councilor found guilty of assault on police officer related to ICE arrest
articles.description:

summary: Etel Haxhiaj was found guilty of assaulting a police officer during an ICE arrest.
